steps: Go to your Faculty office and submit all your credentials for clearance, credentails includes: 1. JAMB and WAEC original result2. Admission letter 3. clearance certifciacte from school
Pay you school fees on the portal
Pay all other dues
Visit your level adviser from your department to advise you on courses to select
complelete your course Registration
Print All reciepts and course form from portal
Pay Faculty and Departmental Dues at student Organization office
Visit your faculty office, submit all printed reciepts and course form
Visit your departmental office and submit all printed reciepts and course form
Visit school building to pay for your Triabl and religious dues
Submit a copy of your fees, dearmental fee and course form at Senate building
Visit student affairs with all printed reciepts and course form
Proceed to the school clinic to registration
Proceed to the school Library for registration
Proceed to ICT Center for your ID card capturing
